summary: The daughter of a rich criminal industrial tycoon falls in love with a college boy. The tycoon, what a surprise, objects...
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Ameesha Patel|Kiran Kumar|Mukesh Tiwari|Nishigandha Wad|Shahbaaz Khan|Madhuri Sanjeev|Alok Nath|Jimmy Moses|Shaikh Sami|Ali Asgar|Hemant Pandey|Jasbir Thandi|Suchit Jadhav|Prithvi Zutshi|Neha Bam|Vrajesh Hirjee|Mushtaq Khan|Firdaus Mevawala
title: Aap Mujhe Achche Lagne Lage
